name: beeper
title: Beeper Desktop
description: Access your chats from Beeper Desktop (requires Beeper Desktop API to be enabled)
author: batuhan

commands.name: global-search
commands.title: Global Search
commands.description: Search across all chats, groups, and messages

commands.name: find-chat
commands.title: Find Chat
commands.description: Search and find chats from Beeper Desktop

commands.name: list-chats-all
commands.title: List All Chats
commands.description: List all chats with details and preview

commands.name: search-messages
commands.title: Search Messages
commands.description: Search for messages across all chats

commands.name: list-messages
commands.title: List Messages in Chat
commands.description: List all messages in a specific chat

commands.name: send-message
commands.title: Send Message
commands.description: Send a message to a chat

commands.name: create-chat
commands.title: Create Chat
commands.description: Create a new single or group chat

commands.name: search-contacts
commands.title: Search Contacts
commands.description: Search for contacts on an account

commands.name: focus-app
commands.title: Focus Beeper Desktop
commands.description: Bring Beeper Desktop to the foreground

preferences.name: baseUrl
preferences.title: Beeper Desktop API Base URL
preferences.description: The base URL for Beeper Desktop API (default: http://localhost:23373)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
